text: Frederick Jacobus Marthinus 'Marco' Mason (born ) is a South African rugby union player for Santboiana in the División de Honor in Spain. He previously played first class rugby for the in the Currie Cup and the in the Rugby Challenge in 2012 and 2017. His regular position is fullback. ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:People from Mogalakwena Local Municipality Category:Rugby union fullbacks Category:Free State Cheetahs players Category:Sportspeople from Limpopo
title: Marco Mason
